title: The Automated Vehicles Act 2024 (Commencement No. 1) Regulations 2025
summary: These Regulations are the first commencement Regulations made under the Automated Vehicles Act 2024 (c. 10) (“the Act”). They bring into force specified provisions of the Act.
relevance_to_digital: No explicit reference to digital systems.
relevance_to_data: No explicit reference to data governance.
relevance_to_ai: Artificial intelligence is not explicitly referenced.
